ygData.subject: Bards of Xegony
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all. I am Atonal Steelstring, as most of you know from my posts on here.  I have a request. I am level 35.  My guild is level 55+.  However, leaving my
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all.

I am Atonal Steelstring, as most of you know from my posts on here. I have
a request.

I am level 35. My guild is level 55+. However, leaving my guild is not an
option. They are truly my friends, as much as any friend I've ever had.
Leaving them would be like leaving family.

There was a time, when I was closer in level to them, however, I don't get a
whole lot of playing time, and never have. As a result, I've been
outlevelled.

My request is simple. I'm missing huge portions of the game, being limited
strictly to pickup groups in such everyday places as FM and OT. I'm missing
doing the truly fun and dangerous stuff like Nurga, Droga, Dalnir, Guk, etc.
because I have no one to raid with. I'm sick of the safe, boring, pull kill
pull kill pull kill exp grind sitting on the side of a hill, with the only
danger being wandering Dragoons and inept groups. I want to dungeon crawl.
I'm sick of dying due to ebay pullers (no offense to ebayers in general,
just ebayers who don't at least start a new char to learn on before
subjecting the rest of us to inept high level characters). I don't mind
deaths....as long as I can sit back while I'm 'LOADING, PLEASE WAIT...'ing,
and say, Damn, that was AMAZING!

If any of you will have me, please consider me when doing mid-level raids.
If any of your guilds are of the appropriate level, I'd be glad to drop by
your message boards and post a note, to introduce myself. Just send me a
link.

Thanks!

Atonal Steelstring
Machin Shin
